product_name: The North Face Balance Tank Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Balance tank top effortlessly keeps up with your active lifestyle with soft, stretchy fabric that remains flexible and breathable. Polyester/elastane blend gets a boost of breathability from Coolmax(R) technology that helps wick moisture away from skin and speed dry time. Paneled construction emphasizes support and breathability; scoop back promotes freedom of motion. The North Face Balance tank top features an internal shelf bra that provides light support; contrasting seaming adds visual interest.
short_description: The North Face Balance tank top effortlessly keeps up with your active lifestyle with soft, stretchy fabric that remains flexible and breathable.
